Trump puts military on notice as cities brace for more protestsCities across the nation are undergoing the fifth night of protests in the wake of the death in Minneapolis of George Floyd, a handcuffed black man who pleaded for air as a white police officer pressed a knee on his neck. Here is the latest from protests around the country.
Images from protests across the nation
The Pentagon ordered the Army to put military police units on alert to head to Minneapolis on short notice at Trump’s request
